title: Countersink Guide for Drill Press 2 Inch
description: I needed to drill a counter sink hole in a two inch wide slat for a love seat/bench. This jig held the slat perfectly in position on my drill press table as I drilled holes in 8 slats. There are even holes on the underside for 10mm x 5 mm rare earth magnets to hold it to the iron drill press top.

title: Quarter Inch Spacer 2 ways
description: When building a love seat, I needed to space slats 1/4 inches apart. This two way spacer allows me to put 1/4 inch between slats and even 1/4 inch on top if needed.

title: USB Switch Panel w/Labels
description: The front panel design for this Instructable https://www.instructables.com/USB-30-Cable-Power-Switch/conference.
